Class BoundedCounter

java.lang.Object
  




public class BoundedCounter
extends java.lang.Object

A simple counter with a max occupancy. This version of Counter is that amended during week 3's lectoral. It includes decrementCount() which uses selection.

Version:
2.1
Author:
Grant Allenby
